tool_description: DNS lookup tool that covers a wide range of functionality, including DNS lookups, Reverse DNS searching.
name: dnsleuth
title: dnsleuth

api_list.name: /dns/reverse/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dnsleuth.p.rapidapi.com/dns/reverse/google.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dnsleuth.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dnsleuth.p.rapidapi.com/dns/reverse/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dnsleuth.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
